comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Painting of similar view at www.bbc.co.uk/arts/yourpaintings/paintings/high-tor-matlo... and this picture is a carpet! www.john-allen-london.co.uk/images/high_tor.jpg www.andrewsgen.com/matlock/matbath_intro.htm has a modern picture with a kayaker and links to lots of historical information about Matlock Bath and Matlock Dale.
